number_limit.policy: Council may limit number of hackney carriage licences

wheelchair_accessibility.existing_licences: Grandfather rights - can transfer saloon/estate types
wheelchair_accessibility.transfer: Existing HC licence can be transferred to new proprietor maintaining vehicle type
wheelchair_accessibility.policy_intent: Move toward fully wheelchair accessible hackney carriage fleet

vehicle_types: Wheelchair accessible vehicles (mandatory for new additional licences)
mandatory_equipment: Taximeter - tested and sealed by approved station
Tariff card visible to passengers showing current council tariff
Hackney carriage licence plates - front and rear
vehicle_requirements.colour_livery: No mandatory colour restriction (unlike some authorities)

insurance_requirement.named_persons: Must name proprietor and any drivers

application_steps.check: Review hackney carriage conditions and rule book

application_steps.test: Vehicle fitness test including taximeter calibration
application_steps.pass_required: Vehicle inspection certificate required with application

application_steps.obtain: Hire and reward insurance covering hackney carriage use

documents: Vehicle inspection certificate from approved station
Basic DBS certificate (if not Gloucester licensed driver)

application_steps.delays: May take longer - contact after 20 working days

application_steps.collect: Collect plates and fix to vehicle
application_steps.start_work: Can begin operating as hackney carriage

ongoing_requirements.inspection: Annual vehicle inspection at approved testing station
ongoing_requirements.age_threshold: If 8 years or older - 6-monthly inspections required
ongoing_requirements.insurance: Maintain valid insurance - notify any changes within 7 days
ongoing_requirements.taximeter: Keep calibrated and sealed - any repairs require re-testing
ongoing_requirements.licence_display: Display licence plates at all times

vehicle_requirements.passengers: Maximum 8 passengers (over 8 requires DVSA operator licence)
vehicle_requirements.drive_side: Left or right hand drive permitted
mandatory_equipment: Yellow private hire licence plates - front and rear
prohibited_signage: Cannot display anything suggesting hackney carriage
vehicle_requirements.advertising: Permitted only for private hire company operating vehicle - must include 'Pre-booking only'

key_differences: Taximeter optional (if fitted must be tested)

approved_testing_stations.requirement: All vehicles must be inspected at approved testing station

vehicle_licence_renewal.when: Before expiry - cannot operate if expired
vehicle_licence_renewal.reference_number: Need vehicle licence reference number from renewal letter
requirements: Vehicle inspection certificate from approved testing station
Confirm proprietor details unchanged or notify changes

change_of_vehicle.when_needed: Changing to different vehicle while keeping same licence
requirements: New vehicle must meet all licensing conditions
Vehicle inspection certificate for new vehicle

special_cases.like_for_like_temporary: Contact council - e.g. vehicle over 5 years needs temporary replacement

transfer_of_ownership.when_needed: Selling licensed vehicle to new owner
requirements: Letter from previous owner confirming no longer using vehicle
V5 registration document or new keeper supplement
MOT certificate (unless less than 1 year old)
Basic DBS certificate (less than 1 month old) unless Gloucester licensed driver
transfer_of_ownership.note: Grandfather rights transfer with vehicle - e.g. non-WAV hackney carriage can remain non-WAV

hackney_carriages.existing_licences: Can continue with saloon/estate if already licensed
hackney_carriages.policy_direction: Moving toward fully accessible hackney carriage fleet

driver_duties: Carry wheelchair user without additional charge

exemptions.medical: Driver may apply for medical exemption if unable to assist
exemptions.vehicle_design: Some vehicles not suitable - designated by council

assistance_dogs.legal_duty: Must carry assistance dogs without extra charge (Equality Act 2010)
assistance_dogs.exemptions: Medical exemption certificate if driver has dog allergy
assistance_dogs.exemption_display: Exemption certificate must be displayed in vehicle
assistance_dogs.breach: Refusing assistance dog is criminal offence unless exempt

external: No sharp edges or protruding items

private_hire.licence_plates: Yellow council-issued plates front and rear
private_hire.door_panels: Operator details permitted on door panels only

insurance.standard_insurance_not_valid: Private car insurance does NOT cover taxi work
insurance.named_drivers: Must name all drivers who will use vehicle
insurance.operator: Private hire insurance must name licensed operator
insurance.validity: Must be valid at all times vehicle available for hire
insurance.changes: Notify council within 7 days of any insurance changes
insurance.evidence: Certificate must be produced on request to officer or police

safety_equipment.seatbelts: Appropriate 3-point seatbelts for all passenger seats
safety_equipment.child_seats: Driver responsible for ensuring children under 14 properly restrained

prohibited_modifications.tinted_windows: Must meet legal requirements for light transmission
prohibited_modifications.suspension: Must not be lowered below manufacturer specification

private_hire_operator.definition: Person or company taking bookings for private hire vehicles
private_hire_operator.legal_requirement: Must hold operator licence to accept or invite bookings for private hire vehicles
responsibilities: Only use Gloucester-licensed drivers and vehicles
Maintain records of all drivers and vehicles used

operating_base.requirement: Must be within Gloucester City Council boundaries
operating_base.planning: May require planning permission for commercial use

record_keeping.retention: Records must be available for inspection

duration_options.typical_for: Established operators with good compliance history
duration_options.note: Discretionary - council may grant shorter duration

private_hire_operator.fee_structure: Varies by number of vehicles in fleet

operator_licence.who_needs: Anyone accepting or inviting bookings for private hire vehicles
operator_licence.legal_requirement: Cannot operate without licence - criminal offence

operating_base.location: Must be within Gloucester City Council boundaries
operating_base.planning: May need planning permission for commercial use from residential property
operating_base.records: All booking records must be kept at operating base

requirements.planning_permission: If operating from home, must not cause nuisance/obstruction
requirements.drivers_and_vehicles: Must only use Gloucester-licensed drivers and vehicles

duration.discretion: Council decides duration based on compliance history

fee_structure.additional_premises: Additional charge for each additional premises (e.g. nightclub booking point)

operator_licence.application: Download rule book and apply online
operator_licence.tax_check: May require HMRC tax check - see guidance

business_rates.relevance: Taxi operators may be liable for business rates

planning_permission.relevance: Operating from home may require planning permission
planning_permission.note: Check before starting operator business from residential property

street_trading.relevance: Different licence - not covered by taxi licensing

parking_enforcement.relevance: Taxi ranks enforced by parking and police
parking_enforcement.ranks: Do not obstruct or misuse taxi ranks
